entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [FAIL] System.Threading.Tests.PeriodicTimerTests.PeriodicTimer_ActiveOperations_TimerRooted #66798
  • IncludeNativeLibrariesForSelfExtract gets permissions error when run under C:\Program Files\ #66796
  • CrossGen2 nupkg on linux-musl-arm64 environment links to wrong libc #66791
    6.0.x
  • DataContractSerializer calls IDeserializationCallback before serialization is completed. #66788
  • [NativeAOT] EXEC : error : Arithmetic operation resulted in an overflow. "...fsbackup2.msbuildproj" System.OverflowException: Arithmetic operation resulted in an overflow #66787
  • `AssemblyName.FullName` doesn't show `PublicKeyToken` portion when the `AssemblyName` instance is returned from `AssemblyName.GetAssemblyName` #66785
  • HttpConnectionPool may leak authorityExpireTimer / hit ObjectDisposedException #66782
  • TlsHandshakeType value 24 should be labeled KeyUpdate #66781
  • System.Collections.Sort<BigStruct>.LinqQuery has regressed on all configs except Windows 64 bit #66776
  • System.Threading.Tests.Perf_Timer.SynchronousContention has regressed on macOS x64 #66774
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: List<T>.Slice #66773
  • Building src/native results in "ignoring unknown option: --minimize" #66770
  • GC deadlock/livelock? #66759
  • [API Proposal]: Add ImmutableArray.Contains overload that accepts an IEqualityComparer<T> #66758
  • System.Resources.Extensions.DeserializingResourceReader cannot load an assembly if .NET WinForms controls are used inside a C++ app #66799
  • XPS documents memory leak (System.Windows.ContextLayoutManager+LayoutQueue+Request and XpsDocument.GetFixedDocumentSequence()) #66756
  • System.Threading.ThreadPools.Tests.ThreadPoolTests.CooperativeBlockingCanCreateThreadsFaster has failed #66755
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Collections.Tests.Perf_BitArray and System.Collections.IndexerSet<Int32> #66769
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_RustLang_Sherlock #66768
  • Test failure JIT\\Stress\\ABI\\pinvokes_d\\pinvokes_d.cmd #66745

Closed

  • Cannot use BenchmarkDotNet with NativeAOT #66637
  • Cannot find mkstemps nor mkstemp on this platform (CMake Error at src/runtime.*/artifacts/source-build/self/src/src/libraries/Native/Unix/configure.cmake:788) #66340
  • Analyzer Suggestion: Don't seal properties on sealed types #41980
    Future
  • [DllImport] on Windows fails to load library on case sensitive filesystem #66608
  • Implement an analyzer to detect usage of RequiresPreviewFeaturesAttribute #52726
    Future
  • [New rule] Notify that foreach may throw InvalidCastException #54629
    Future
  • Serializing public interface with internal implementation works with JSON but not with XML #60523
  • [API Proposal]: Expose `NativeLength` in `Array` #66775
  • Analyzer proposal: ThreadStatic on a non-static field #46626
    7.0.0
  • build.sh command not build coreclr in OSX #66789
  • [wasm][debugger] Show a better stack trace for final user #63466
  • ArrayPool returns an array of 2_097_152 elements when asked 1024 * 1024 + 1 (1_048_577) #66779
  • Boxing / Unboxing operations in Vectors ? #66780
  • PeriodicTimer_ActiveOperations_TimerRooted failure on Debian 10 #62809
  • threading.WaitForSingleObject.WFSOExSemaphoreTest failed in CI on Centos #6920
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add JsonEncodedText equivalent to XmlWriter #64513
  • System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping needs sudo to ping an endpoint in .NET 7 preview 2 #66746
    7.0.0
  • System.Threading.ThreadPools.Tests.ThreadPoolTests.CooperativeBlockingCanCreateThreadsFaster test failed #65954
  • Visual Basic Bug for net6.0 when using StartsWith with a function call inside starts with for ascii characters that are not normal keyboard characters #66751
  • [API Proposal]: Add UriSchemeUrn field to Uri #66293
    7.0.0
  • .net 6 broken migration JsonElement to dynamic #66517
  • Binding to non-null IEnumerable doesn't work #36390
    7.0.0
  • Package versioning vs framework versioning #66722
    Future
  • sqlpackage AdditionalDeploymentContributor dll .net 6.0 #66732
  • Remove dotnet6 feeds when dependencies publish into dotnet7 feeds. #57716
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'comp->supportSIMDTypes()' #66206
    7.0.0
  • Bug in System.IO Directory.GetDirectories and Directory.GetFiles methods when used with System.IO.SearchOption.AllDirectories #65180
    Future
  • Test failure JIT\\Performance\\CodeQuality\\Roslyn\\CscBench\\CscBench.cmd #66564
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\GitHub_35821\\GitHub_35821\\GitHub_35821.cmd #66565
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Json 5.0.0 cannot refer to System.Text.Json 5.0.1 #66532
  • Regressions in System.Net.Http.Tests.SocketsHttpHandlerPerfTest #66343
    7.0.0
  • Make all structs that claim to be thread-safe dereference `this` at most once per entrypoint #14746
    Future
  • [wasm] Regression on windows/AOT - `mono-aot-cross.exe` crashes every time #66718
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.EventSource` #66802
    community-contribution
  • Track all HttpConnectionPoolManager instances in a global list #66801
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Remove delegate/closure allocations from DynamicAssemblies.IsTypeDynamic #66797
    area-System.Xml
  • perf: Pass --dotnet-path to use dotnet-workload for wasm #66795
    arch-wasm
  • Use shared SocketAddress code in QUIC #66794
  • [wasm] Do not set _WasmDevel=true for blazor projects #66793
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Reenable 4611 and 4703 #66792
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Disable Windows arm32 pinvoke stress tests #66790
    disabled-test
  • Fixed TlsHandshakeType enum label #66786
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Replace AsArgument/AsParameter with less P/Invoke-centric concepts #66784
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Add missing OL releases to RID graph #66783
    community-contribution
  • Use no-recent-activity in inactive Draft PRs #66771
  • [mono][interp] Fix a few local store warnings #66766
  • Try to fix a time-sensitive thread pool test #66765
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Remove superfluous string[] and string from System.IO.Packaging.ContentType #66764
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Improve exception thrown when constructing SslCertificateTrust #66763
  • Reduce string allocations in XmlWriterTraceListener #66762
  • Improve `CreateDirectory` on Windows #66754
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Bump IntelliSense package to .NET 7.0 Preview1 #66753
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Fix cancel in PipeReader.ReadAtLeastAsync #66752
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • [mono] Hot Reload: support for reloadable types #66749
    area-EnC-mono
  • Dedup patterm/options/timeout in Regex source generator #66747
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Workaround NuGet error in Content_Types #66744
    area-Serialization

Merged

  • Fix emscripten-version.txt link #66778
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Implement missing SymUnmanaged* interfaces #66650
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Reimplement stubs to improve performance #65738
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Always append the "dll" extension for native libraries loads on Windows #66666
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Ensure the generic math interfaces are implemented implicitly where possible #66748
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix incompatibility between runtime and nuget package #66295
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Don't show the wasm functions on callstack when debugging managed code #64223
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add additional trace to HttpConnectionPool #66605
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Surface native sourcelink on CoreCLR native PDBs for easier dump debugging #66677
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Temporarily disable test failing on OSX #66761
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Update area owners to add 2 triagers #66767
  • Fixes Binding to non-null IEnumerable doesn't work #36390 #66131
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Structs: Do not mark "Hidden buffer pointer" as address-exposed #64130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace StringBuilder with ValueStringBuilder in AssemblyName.FullName #66750
    tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Merge icall-def-netcore.h back into icall-def.h #66730
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove dotnet6 feeds #66447
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove test coverage of FeatureSIMD=0 #66670
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Reenable CA 4701 #66676
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Bump next from 11.1.3 to 12.1.0 in /src/mono/sample/wasm/browser-nextjs #65534
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution

Updated

  • Fix too narrow loads while unspilling #66675
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Publish crossgen as AOT if supported by the target platform #65948
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging` #65262
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Add the CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute type to make it easier to identify marshaller types #65591
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Port Access violation occurring in System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustRelationshipInformation fix from .netfx to .net-core #66726
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Implement NativeLibrary.GetEntryPointModuleHandle #57610
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Move basic w32file* and w32process* functions to eventpipe #66731
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Emscripten 3.1.1 bump #63894
    area-Build-mono
  • Move libunwind directories to src/native/external #64043
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make the `EventSource` generator incremental et.al. #64579
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Use TimeSpan everywhere we use an int for seconds, milliseconds, and timeouts (Group 1/3) #64860
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on firefox #61776
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] Don't cache commandline in coreclr diagnostics server #63356
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [PERF][TEST] Enable use MONO_ENV_OPTIONS="--llvm" on perf runs. #66742
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add flags checks to BMI1 intrinsic lowering #66736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Only use first field maps for shared statics #66558
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Load C++/CLI DLLs built against .NET 7.0+ in default ALC #66486
    area-Host
  • Support using the system version of brotli #66462
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Proposed changes to ECMA 335 for checked user-defined operators #66714
    area-Meta
  • WIP: [Mono] Fix warnings to enable W4 on Windows. #66710
    os-windows, area-Build-mono
  • Use ROS<byte> instead of byte[] where it makes sense on S.S.C.Cose #66741
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • runtime: add RIDs for anolis distro #66132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Fix non-portable distroRID generation on Alpine Linux #62942
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Change ConfigurationBinder to avoid reading properties unnecessarily. #66723
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Adds Range Manipulation APIs for Collection<T> and ObservableCollection<T> #65101
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Consolidate sync/async JsonSerializer test abstractions #66729
    area-System.Text.Json, test-enhancement, 7.0.0
  • Add metrics for caching #66479
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • [mono] Fix static virtual calls to generic methods from gshared code #66739
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][jit] Pass generic context when ldftn of generic method #66350
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Introduce write barriers in wasm bindings, migrate to ref/out params, add gc safe regions #65994
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Methods on primitives 65707 #66654
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, needs-author-action
  • Add xarch `blsmsk` #66561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update windows build machines #65798
    area-Infrastructure
  • Run illink before ApiCompat #66706
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Do not reorder HTTP header values #65249
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging aot on CI #66685
    arch-wasm
  • changing CPU from int to double #66743
  • [mono][wasm]Enable WASM exceptions as an experiment #66524
    NO-REVIEW, area-Build-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] [Question] Should the generic ctx arg be a native int? #1875

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] EXEC : error : Arithmetic operation resulted in an overflow. "...fsbackup2.msbuildproj" System.OverflowException: Arithmetic operation resulted in an overflow #1877
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] error : The PrivateSdkAssemblies ItemGroup is required for _ComputeAssembliesToCompileToNative #1876
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] [Question] Pointer assignment without GTF_IND_TGT_NOT_HEAP ? #1872

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add math helpers for Wasm #1879
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Support for GT_LCL_FLD, disable FEATURE_FIXED_OUT_ARGS for wasm #1878

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Support for storing locals of type struct #1866

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet publish --self-contained can't handle build-time references #24434
  • global.json version mismatch warning is not actionable #24429
  • runtimesettings.dev.json is gone ; surprising breakage #24427
  • error NETSDK1083: The specified RuntimeIdentifier 'ubuntu.22.04-x64' is not recognized when doing source building package for Ubuntu Jammy 22.04 #24425
  • dotnet tool install fails if version contains uppercase #24419

PullRequests

Created

  • Make the net6 warning when running in 16.11 say or higher #24431
  • [dotnet-watch] Skip Run_WithHotReloadEnabled_ReadsLaunchSettings_WhenUsingProjectOption as it is flaky #24428
  • Update feature flag logic to disable only semantics #24426
    Area-DotNet Test

Merged

  • Move WebAssembly ProjectCapability to props file #24237
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix unstable test #24410
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.2xx' #24302
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Update minimum vs version to 17.2 #24438
  • Properly handle empty solution and project paths in SDK resolver #24333
    Area-SdkResolvers
  • Add default file inclusion support in .NET SDK for RESW and image files in WinAppSDK .NET projects. #24139
    Area-WebSDK
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1669238 #24395
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #24416
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Add support for RazorLangVersion 7.0 #24383
    Area-AspNetCore

Issues

Updated

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0055 false positive with no line ending after assembly directive #60242
  • No obvious way to "View Code" of an .editorconfig after the designer was added #60236
    17.2
  • No response when adding editorconfig File(.NET/default) item to Cmake project node #60235
    17.2
  • EditorConfig designer truncates text with no tooltips #60234
    17.2
  • The status of the editorconfig file is unedited after modifying the .editorconfig file #60233
    17.2
  • dotnet_style_require_accessibility_modifiers missing from C# Code Style settings UI #60237
  • .editorconfig UI doesn't update values #60232
    17.2
  • Inline Hints: Modify the tagger logic to be less convoluted #60229
    17.3

Closed

  • Race condition in parameter hints when inserting argument name #59843
    17.2
  • [Flaky test] Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.MSBuild.UnitTests.NetCoreTests.TestOpenProject_NetCoreApp #60066
    17.2
  • Fix Test_Windows_CoreClr_Debug_Single_Machine job #60218
  • ArgumentException from AnalyzerDriver #59626
  • Instance member signatures are shown in a static member context #23133
    Backlog
  • Instance member signatures are shown in a static member context #33549
    Backlog
  • Unhandled exception in compilation on deconstruction through generic-constrained interface #60187
    17.2
  • [loc][query] Assistance with translations. #48366
    Compiler.Next
  • Incremental source generators do not recover from an exception #58625
    17.2
  • Program using Roslyn Compiler works in 4.8 but not in net5 #50612
  • IDE0072 Populate switch false positive and code switch generates invalid code #60201
  • `#line` directive causes odd debugger behavior #44123
  • Unrecoverable VS error from invalid local function in top level statements #48200
  • GetDeclaredSymbol's return type is not annotated as a nullable symbol #42992
  • Test plan for "Mix declarations and variables in deconstruction" #47746
  • Warnlevel 6 warnings were not documented #58132
  • Roslyn fails to work when RSA+SHA1 is not available #59880
  • Compiled dll cant use, System.Private.CoreLib.dll failed #43473
  • Flaky test CodeGenOperators.EmitSequenceOfBinaryExpressions_06 #41900
  • pm #60195
  • "Null check can be clarified" assumes derived type check is a null check #60221

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove Name property, make NotificationOption immutable #60245
  • Add IMethodSymbol.IsIterator and forward to symbol IsIterator #60244
  • Suppress nullable property/field initialization warning for required members #60243
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #60241
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Revert "Initialize default capabilities before switching to the UI th… #60240
  • Fix a typo and an inconsistency #60238
    Community
  • Stabilize ErrorsAfterClosingFile test #60228
  • Don't complete quotes if they complete a valid string #60227
    Area-IDE
  • Apply 'require accessibility modifiers' setting on interface methods #60226
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Show linked symbol in Inheritance Margin #60225
    Area-IDE
  • Don't offer convert to switch when an implicit cast is present #60224
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid resizing array builder while get unaliased references #60220
    Area-Compilers
  • New hot reload interfaces #60219
    Area-Interactive

Merged

  • Remove unused local #59963
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Switch color loading to be async. #60205
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60207
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Move Dartlab tests to VS-Platform #60075
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Error when required members are not set #60101
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Inline hints: Double click to insert hint can overwrite buffer of previous inserted hint if done too quickly #60204
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Revert Global indentation options (#59679) #60199
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update NuGet version #60231
    Next
  • Add basic benchmark for returning text edits in LSP completion #60239
    Next
  • Fixed simple signature help bugs #59969
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1662698 #60168
    auto-merge
  • Adjust CheckedKeywordRecommender for checked user-defined operators. #60183
    Area-IDE, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Use frozen partial semantics for syntax classification #60122
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Initial implementation of a new 'lightweight' background-work-indicator that we can use in-situ in the editor. #59759
    Area-IDE
  • Clarify guidelines in Parser.md #56987
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix nullability crash in deconstruction of type parameter #60200
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Source generators/fix exception latching #59930
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, Next
  • Add link to doc for VS insertion process #60222
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Initialize default capabilities before switching to the UI thread #60106
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Normalize values for `ROSLYN_TEST_*` in `TestRunner` #60196
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix typo in OmniSharp ExternalAccess #60217
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.3 #60247
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60246
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Support declaring and binding to methods with `params Span<T>` #59123
    Area-Compilers
  • AbstractFlowPass.VisitStackAllocArrayCreation should use the regular way for visiting initializer #60210
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix handling for source generated documents in LSIF #59891
    Area-IDE
  • Simplifier options #60174
    Area-IDE
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Build with net6.0 #59429
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix conversion issues in null coalescing operator #60202
    Area-Compilers
  • Implicit field initialization in struct constructors #59788
    Area-Compilers
  • Compiler warning CS8600 message: say possibly null-valued expression #58860
    Area-Compilers
  • Try to provide fine-grained text changes in await-completion to help out other hosts. #60197
    Area-IDE
  • Workspace config options #59790
    Area-IDE
  • Add basic TS LSP server #59639
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Fix type parameter scoping for local functions #60098
    Area-Compilers
  • Correct indentation for action values (sub-items) #59909
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Use synthesized methods for compiler-generated switch exceptions #59975
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update ToImmutableArrayAsync to work with all cancellation patterns #60050
    Area-IDE
  • Formatting and code generation options #60127
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider re-designing the Blazor WASM authentication stack #40764
  • Simplify setting W3C Trace Context in SignalR browser clients #40763
  • Add the property NavLink.IsActive and the event handler NavLink.ActivationChanged #40762
  • Configure WebApplicationBuilder directly instead of with ConfigureWebHostDefaults #40761
  • Hot Reload not working with Razor cshtml in Azure Functions #40759
  • [Blazor][Wasm] Set oidc Authentication Options to Local Storage #40757
    Backlog
  • WebHostBuilderExtensions UseStartup() uses incorrect logic to determine AssemblyName #40755
  • Using WithSummary() for Minimal API endpoints does not render when using Swashbuckle.AspNetCore #40753
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Cannot bind StringValues for optional HTTP request header with Minimal APIs #40752
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Ignore Null Properties #40751
  • Filtering SignalR ping messages #40750
  • Blazor WASM site not working on iOS 15.4 / iPhone 13 #40749
  • Upgrade `Microsoft.IdentityModel.Protocols.OpenIdConnect` dependency to use none-blocking method `ValidateTokenAsync` #40748
  • HttpRequest with leading \r before request-line rejected with BadRequestException #40747
  • CVE-2022-0778 security vulnerability on .net aspnet core 6 runtime #40746

Closed

  • Drag & Drop #18754
    Backlog
  • IIS HTTP/2 features version check wrong? #40756
  • How to change Blazor Wasm stand-alone to hosted #40739
  • Make RateLimiters disposable #38308
    7.0-preview2
  • SignalR negotiation sometimes fails on the first attempt #40413
  • Cant get the Site to work on Publish #40722
  • IHostBuilder.Build() times out after 5 seconds when running integration tests with WebApplicationFactory<T> on slow machines #40715
  • Net.Maui Blazor not running on Android 7.1 Tablet #39086
    7.0-preview3
  • Blazor is NOT loosing SignalR connection. Browser is! #40721
  • Email Generation Using Blazor #40758
  • Support falling back to ConnectionId when RawConnectionId is 0 in HTTP.sys #40728
    7.0-preview3
  • Adding feature to Router for custom language URL #40736
  • Use server garbage collection in the Worker Service project template #39578
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor hosted site thorw 503 on IIS and IIS Express, works fine in kestrel #40494
  • After updating to .Net6 An unhandled exception occurred while processing the request. <component type="typeof(App)" render-mode="ServerPrerendered" /> #40593
  • CORS preflight requests is not properly evaluated? + unclear CORS documentation #40616

PullRequests

Created

  • Update MAUI Exception Handling #40765
    area-blazor, 6.0.x
  • Support falling back to ConnectionId when RawConnectionId is 0 on HTTP.sys #40760
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Stop using optional catch binding in JSInterop #40737
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview3
  • Support falling back to ConnectionId when RawConnectionId is 0 on HTTP.sys #40733
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview3
  • Regenerate compiled DeveloperExceptionPage views #40711
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IllegalStateException when setting a shadow in a DataTemplate in a CollectionView #5402
  • Cursor jumps on Entry with IsPassword #5401
  • Dotnet-podcasts app fails to build for iOS #5400
  • .NET MAUI macOS target publishing/archiving #5399
  • Preview 14: Dependency Injection not working anymore #5398
  • Shell No longer displays correctly in Preview 13 on IPad #5396
  • RCL Hybrid App _component dosnt load on windows/android platform #5392
  • `ConfigureEssentials` called `AppActions.SetAsync` even if the app doesn't use App Actions feature #5388
  • Command bound with MenuFlyoutItem is not getting executed, whereas Clicked event is working fine #5382
  • ContentPresenter or View BindableProperty no preloaded view has shown. #5381
  • Binding relative source does not work for me #5380
  • Screenshot (Essentials API) not working in Windows platform #5378
  • Compile errors when adding UseMaui to WinUI desktop project #5372
  • resizing Window breaks `Frame.CornerRadius` #5366
  • Wrapping Layout in a `Frame` breaks controls #5365
  • [Windows/Android] Preview 14 Editor does not resize automatically #5363
  • Remove UWP BootstrapHelper #5362

Closed

  • ActivityIndicator in windows will not center #4544
  • [Android]RTL flow direction not working in Button #4742
  • Workloads fail to update after installing 2022 17.2 Preview 2 #5356
  • TimePicker only shows time when mouse hovers on Windows #5358
  • Running installed .NET MAUI Blazor app fails on Windows #5024
  • SearchBar crashes on Windows #5359
  • Connectivity.ConnectivityChanged is not working on Windows #5375
  • NullReferenceException in CreateNativeHandler for HttpClient on IOS #5337
  • MAUI Templates missing in VS 2022 17.2 Preview 2 #5355
  • [Windows] Application.Current.OpenWindow() constantly crashes #5383
  • Radio button group attacahed property not working in complex layout #5393
  • Command.CanExecute does not disable Button #5364
  • Access modifier of ScreenshotImplementation is set to Internal on Windows platform #5379
  • ContentPage with Constructor Injection leads to Exception #5376
  • After updating to Preview 14, SkiaSharp throws: Type SkiaSharp.Views.Maui.Handlers.SKCanvasViewHandler has invalid vtable method slot 39 with method none #5371
  • [Android] Application crashed while load more images on scroll view #5339
  • ItemDisplayBinding Property not working in Window #5370
  • bad grid layout #5343
  • FlowDirection has changed when set MauiDrawable as NativeView's background at run time #3662
  • [Windows] Wrong Frame content sizes #4078
  • [Windows] Grid contained in a frame isn't resizing when window size is dragged larger/smaller #4950
  • [Bug] MediaPicker.CapturePhotoAsync() issue in OnePlus Pro physical device #2474
  • Maui Blazor Release Config App Throws Error #5301
  • [Bug] Android.Gms.Auth.Api.Phone and SmsRetriever not found #2944
  • Mac Catalyst CMD+Q doesn't close application #5026
  • [Bug] View Position does not updated on dynamically #2041
  • [Bug] ArrangeChildren does not called for children in custom layout #2132
  • [Bug] [Android] WebView Not Filling Contents of RefreshView unless Width or HeightRequested set. #2442
  • [Bug] MAUI Preview 9: Changes to iOS info.plist are ignored #2943
  • [Bug] ListView ObservableCollection ItemsSource not updating properly. CollectionView item selection highlight not selecting #3342
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.WindowsForms use with NotifyIcon #3491
    .NET 7
  • On iOS: SVG's load a lot bigger than they should in Tab Bar. #3579
  • [Bug] Custom font not working when used inside a custom library #3584
  • SearchHandler.ItemTemplate can not be fill #4589
  • [Bug] Cannot put files in Platforms platform folders #2820
  • .Net MAUI does not accept multi-language .resx files for iOS #4568

PullRequests

Created

  • Clean up flow direction tests for Layouts on Windows #5406
  • Fix 'Properties' folder visibility in the .NET MAUI Blazor template #5405
  • [MacCatalyst] Fix usage of pickers on the Mac #5404
  • Don't call AppActions.SetAsync if no AppActions have been registered. #5403
  • Fixed bug in NavigationPage ToolbarItems were not visible #5397
  • BackButtonBehavior WinUI Fixes #5391
  • Fixed rename of SetOnAppTheme -> SetAppTheme #5390

Merged

  • RTL FlowDirection fix for Windows #5205
    area/layout 🔲
  • [Windows] Fix TextColor issues on TimePicler #5373
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, control-datetimepicker
  • [Blazor] Fix Win UI deployed app #5377
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [Windows] Fix crash using SearchBar #5369
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, fatal, control-entry
  • Use the current window's dispatcher for MainThread #5389
  • Lazy-load Configuration #5348
  • Make `ScreenshotImplementation` on Windows public #5386
    t/bug, area/essentials 🍞
  • Remove hidden Vector2 type #5374
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix typo in repro.md #5368
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update bug report template with Preview 14 #5367
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [MacCatalyst] Only respond to selectors that we exported in this class #5361
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/single project ☝️, 6.0.300-rc.1

Updated

  • Mark all the Device [Obsolete] #5088
    area/migration 🚚, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Improved non-HTTP(S) link handling behavior #5313
  • Mark renderers and related base classes as obsolete #5322
  • [LOC_HB] checkin of localized string files #5352
  • [Core] Implement BackgroundImageSource in PageHandler #3396
    area/controls 🎮, control-pages, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [GH-4958] Platform behavior implementation #5043
  • Add additional VisualDiagnostic Image APIs #5360
  • Remove SetupDefaults #5317
  • Update WASDK & Cleanup Single Project .props #5333
  • Add first iteration of default style theme #5111
    do-not-merge
  • Improve Glide usage for Image Loading on Android #5198
  • [dualscreen] project/nuget for Surface Duo and other Android foldables #5020
    area/controls 🎮, control-dualscreen
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future
  • [android] update Xamarin.Google.Guava.ListenableFuture #5305
    platform/android 🤖
  • [WIP] Rework use of ObtainStyledAttributes so we can enable `AndroidLinkResources` #4912
  • [X] Compile FontSizeConverter #5338
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • [Windows] Implement FlyoutHeaderBehavior property #5345
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢
  • BlazorWebView: Allow for WPF and WinForms WebView2 Custom Startup Settings and Fixed Distribution Mode #5086
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Trimming Clean up #5028
    area/app-size 🤏

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Spatialite causes native crash in spatial tests on Ubuntu impish #27662
  • FileLoadException: System.Runtime v6.0.0 when using scaffolder with latest dotnet-7 feed dotnet-ef tool. #27660
  • Many to Many, Hide One collection Navigation property #27658
  • [CompiledQuery] Expression of type 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.Internal.SingleQueryingEnumerable cannot be used for return type 'System.Linq.IQueryable #27657

Closed

  • Different delete behaviour #27661
  • Generate the script for all migrations that have not yet been applied to a given database #21995
  • Queryable projection faults when assigning default values #27659
  • Complex value comparer expressions can not be translated by the in-memory query pipeline #27495
    7.0.0
  • SQLite SaveChanges: Use RETURNING clause #24835
    7.0.0
  • Using SQL Server UTF8 collations #25798
    7.0.0
  • Switch to RETURNING/OUTPUT as the default way to retrieve generated values for INSERT #27503
    7.0.0
  • SQL Server: Optimize SQL Server OUTPUT clause usage when retrieving database-generated values #27372
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add TPC support for migrations #27665
  • [release/6.0] Query: Assign proper type to collection result expression (part 2) #27664
  • Use RETURNING/OUTPUT clause for UPDATE/DELETE #27663

Merged

  • Bump NetTopologySuite.IO.SqlServerBytes from 2.0.0 to 2.1.0 #27518
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Ensure FK properties have nullable-appropriate value comparers #27654
  • Support SQL Server UTF8 strings #27634
  • Improve SQL Server insertion logic and other update pipeline optimizations #27573
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Update to .NET SDK 7.0 Preview 2 #27447
    auto-merge
  • Refactor ReaderModificationCommandBatch #27584
  • Revert "feat (codespaces) - Add initial support for codespaces (#27483)" #27655
